ygData.subject: OT: Soundcards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well - they re still doing weird things with sound.  I know that recently all of my combat sounds started sounding really far away - Like they re
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:20 AM 3/3/00 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
>
>OK, this OT even on Easter Eggs, but since Verant has been totally unable to
>help me, maybe somebody else on this list can. I cannot ever hear any of
>the non-combat sounds that mobs make. No skittering of feet, no giants
>stomping, no wolves howling, no madmen begging. I have an A3d card with the
>latest drivers and I know for a fact one of my friends has an A3d card and
>he hears all the sounds just fine. I have tried everything I could think
>of, and Verant's tech support only managed to get all my sounds turned off (
>I fixed that ). Any ideas?

Well - they're still doing weird things with sound. I know that recently
all of my combat sounds started sounding "really far away" - Like they're
happening to someone standing near me, but not to me.

But if I sit down, the sounds are suddenly right?? I guess they have the
"center of source" as the center of the model - not the model's head?

Anyway - I'm wondering if I turn my sound effects down to the point where
3d sound turns off if that will help.

In your case, I'd make sure that my sound settings are maxed. Other than
that, it's the program.

Talies the semi-deaf
